definition: a large and hurried swallow, utter or make a noise, as when swallowing too quickly
details:
noun
- a large and hurried swallow
= example: a large and hurried swallow
= synonyms: draft
- a spasmodic reflex of the throat made as if in swallowing
= synonyms: gulping
verb
- utter or make a noise, as when swallowing too quickly
= example: utter or make a noise, as when swallowing too quickly
- to swallow hurriedly or greedily or in one draught
= example: to swallow hurriedly or greedily or in one draught
= synonyms: swig, quaff
